comments: a(n) = A167192(n+4,4). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 30 2009a(n) = Numerator(sum(1/((k+1)*(k+2)),k=1..n)). This summation has a closed form of 1/2-1/(n+2) and denominator of A145979(n). - _Gary Detlefs_, Sep 16 2011a(n) = n / A109008(n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 25 2013
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,2,0,0,0,-1).
prog: (Sage) [lcm(n,4)/4for n in xrange(1, 77)] # [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 07 2009](PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, write("b060819.txt", n, " ", n / gcd(n, 4)); ) } [_Harry J. Smith_, Jul 12 2009](Haskell)a060819 n = n `div` a109008 n  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 25 2013
author: _Len Smiley_, Apr 30 2001
